name: Finding Home - Demo
description:
A cozy, story-driven, cat adventure with old school mechanics and lots of heart. 

Join Arlo's transition from street to home, meeting new friends, and discovering their new environment. 

Finding home is a 2-D pixel slice-of-life story of a cat and their journey from loneliness and abandonment to finding their new home. As Arlo meets the members of the house, you'll join in a variety of retro-inspired minigames, while also getting to know each family pet.  Life is scary, it's nice to find friends, it's nice to find your home.

After playing the demo, please tell us what you think in a short survey,

https://forms.gle/BArLJ4xbsAjU6BxY7

Thank you,

Grizzly Cat & team
